original: Everything was going great after high school. I found a good job as a mechanic, moved in with my girlfriend and started to plan for a family. Then I got bombed on whisky and PCP one night and ended up holding up a liquor store. Seemed like a good idea at the time! Now I'm three years into a life sentence at the Alderney State Correctional Facility. I am sharing a cell (and all too often a bed) with a psychotic biker called Digger who makes me shave my legs. I am trying to stay positive and it would be great to hear from some of my old high school buddies. Sometimes it's hard to remember what life was like before I became Digger's bitch. Please write to me or come visit! Bring cigarettes if you can. Hope you're all well.
translated: 高中毕业后一切都很顺利。我找了份机械师的好工作，搬去和女朋友住，都开始规划家庭了。然后有天晚上我喝了威士忌，吞了迷幻药，最后抢劫了一家酒水店。当时还觉得这是个好主意！现在我被判无期，已经在Alderney州立监狱蹲了三年。我和一个叫Digger的精神病飞车党同住一个牢房 (通常还同床共枕)，他让我刮掉腿毛。我想尽量保持积极的心态，如果能收到一些高中老同学的回复，那就太好了。都快记不清成为Digger的婊子之前的生活是什么样的了。请给我回信，或是来拜访我！如果可以的话，带上香烟。希望你们一切安好。

original: You got life for holding up a liquor store?
translated: 你抢劫了个酒水店就被终身监禁了？
